resources.string: Captain Kirk is the White Whale and Khan is Captain Ahab, but with spaceships and Chekov has that gross bug put in his ear and they actually made a giant ear prop to film that. Also Spock dies at the end, he wants to get out of doing Star Trek and move on to other things, but they don't let him do that because they bring him back to life in the next movie. So poor Leonard Nimoy has to make 4 more movies still and go to a bunch of conventions and appease a bunch of sweaty nerds. Also you get to hear Shatner scream, \"KHAAAAN\" when they all get trapped inside the underground genesis test, which is a high part of the movie as well. Oh, and of course who could forget the Kobayashi Maru, the vamous no-win scenario comes from this movie as well. But yeah this movie was pretty sweet.
Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
App not replaced with picture of Mr. Cheese wearing a bowtie
